portfolio.title: Clash of Characters
portfolio.description: Inspired by our love of video games, we developed a street fighter styled gaming application where users can choose their character and play against AI generated character.

portfolio.title: Garden2
portfolio.description: An app to help you plan your square foot garden with interactive gardens and database of plants. Users can save their plans for the future as well as their favorite plants.

portfolio.title: Team Profile Generator
portfolio.description: A Node.js command-line application that takes in information about employees on a software engineering team, then generates an HTML webpage that displays summaries for each person.

portfolio.title: Note-Taker
portfolio.description: An application called Note Taker that can be used to write and save notes.

portfolio.title: Employee Tracker
portfolio.description: A command-line application from scratch to manage a company's employee database, using Node.js, Inquirer, and MySQL.

portfolio.title: Journal Playlist
portfolio.description: A frontend developement allowing users to share their feelings and pick a musical playlist based on their emotion

portfolio.title: Tech-Blog
portfolio.description: A CMS-style blog site similar to a Wordpress site, where developers can publish their blog posts and comment on other developers’ posts as well.

portfolio.title: E-Commerce-Site
portfolio.description: In this challege I createed a back end build for an e-commerce site by modifying starter code. I configured a working Express.js API to use Sequelize to interact with a MySQL database.

portfolio.title: Social-Network-API
portfolio.description: An API for a social network web application where users can share their thoughts, react to friends’ thoughts, and create a friend list. This application is a backend project so if you would like to test it out yourself please use Insomnia.

portfolio.title: Weather Dashboard
portfolio.description: A weather app that will run in the broswer using a weather APi to get information.
